unnormalised: Important changes announced for Mumbai local train schedules on 10/10/2024 due to track maintenance. Commuters heading towards Churchgate are advised to check updated timetables. Central Railway line services will be affected between 11:00 AM and 4:00 PM.
normalised: Important changes announced for Mumbai local train schedules on tenth October two thousand and twenty four due to track maintenance. Commuters heading towards Churchgate are advised to check updated timetables. Central Railway line services will be affected between eleven zero zero A-M and four zero zero P-M.

unnormalised: Western Railway has announced cancellation of some services originating from Virar and Dahanu Road between 12:30 PM and 3:30 PM. These adjustments are necessary for safety and efficient track upkeep. Passengers traveling during these hours should consider alternative routes or allow for extra travel time.
normalised: Western Railway has announced cancellation of some services originating from Virar and Dahanu Road between twelve thirty P-M and three thirty P-M. These adjustments are necessary for safety and efficient track upkeep. Passengers traveling during these hours should consider alternative routes or allow for extra travel time.

unnormalised: For real-time updates and detailed information, visit the official Indian Railways website or download the RailMadad app. Also, stay tuned to local news channels for the latest announcements regarding train timings on 10th Oct, 2024.
normalised: For real-time updates and detailed information, visit the official Indian Railways website or download the RailMadad app. Also, stay tuned to local news channels for the latest announcements regarding train timings on tenth October, two thousand and twenty four.
